messages.title: Fighting against Hard Brexit
messages.content: Liberal Democrats are the only party that has always fought for Britain's membership of the European Union, and that's why we are fighting for you to have your say on the final Brexit deal.

messages.title: Standing up for the NHS
messages.content: We know we need additional investment in health and care services as a matter of urgency. The Liberal Democrats would give it the funds it needs.

messages.title: Opposing school cuts
messages.content: Local schools are under threat from a Conservative Party that has stopped listening to local people. Schools in Sutton Coldfield are set to lose £8.5million from their budgets.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ensure the public has a say on the final Brexit deal.
Increase investment in health and care services.
Challenge the funding cuts to local schools in Sutton Coldfield.

issues.brexitEurope: Liberal Democrats are fighting for the public's say on the Brexit deal.
issues.education: Schools in Sutton Coldfield are set to lose £8.5million from their budgets.
issues.health: Liberal Democrats plan to increase funding for health and care services.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet includes promotion for tactical voting to change the direction of the country.
